message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low.  $13000 is the absolute lowest I can go. This still gives you a great deal, as it's less than the value you've placed on the product. Let's see if we can find common ground here.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12500. That's the lowest I can go.
